title: Genre-Based Instruction and TPACK Integration: Indonesian Language Teacher Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education combining genre-based pedagogy with TPACK (Technological·Pedagogical·Content Knowledge) competencies in mobile-device-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain how to apply the TPACK framework to genre-based pedagogy using mobile applications.
Learners can propose at least three integration strategies for technology, pedagogy, and content knowledge when developing Indonesian language education scenarios.
Learners can complete genre analysis and digital content production projects using smartphone-based tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
